title: My Projects
subtitle: Here’s a collection of my personal learning projects and professional works built using various modern technologies.

personal.discription: A responsive e-commerce web app where users can browse, search, and buy products seamlessly. Focused on UI performance and cart management.
A complete social media platform supporting posts, likes, comments, and user authentication — built for practical full-stack learning.
A photo management app where users can upload, organize, and manage visibility of images (public/private) securely.
A secure CRUD app with authentication and password recovery system using 6-digit OTP verification.
A simple app to add, edit, and manage contact details during my early learning phase.
A platform connecting job seekers and employers with authentication and job posting/searching functionalities.
A simple to-do app created to learn state management and CRUD basics during my early practice.

professional.discription: Developed with a team to manage education institutions — featuring Admin, Teacher, and Student panels for classes, schedules, fees, chat, and more.

professional.proname: Time Tracking Application with Real-Time Data
professional.discription: Built a real-time productivity tracking system with screenshot capture, session management, and location tracking.
Built admin & employee dashboards, handling attendance, leave, reports, and payroll integration for HR teams.
Worked on crypto dashboards, wallet integrations, and blockchain-based data visualization for secure transactions.
Developed a real-time chat and customer support web application for internal organization use.
